sqlMap.insert:
select localgisguiaurbana.mapsequence.nextval from dual
insert into localgisguiaurbana.map (mapid, mapidgeopista, minx, miny, maxx, maxy, mapidentidad, mappublic, srid, mapdefault) values (#mapid:INTEGER#, #mapidgeopista:INTEGER#, #minx:DOUBLE#, #miny:DOUBLE#, #maxx:DOUBLE#, #maxy:DOUBLE#, #mapidentidad:NUMERIC#, #mappublic:SMALLINT#, #srid:VARCHAR#, #mapdefault:SMALLINT#)
